about_the_game:
Venture into the farthest reaches of space in "Galactic Starforce", a vibrant and engaging visual novel. You play as a fresh cadet, the newest and only human member aboard the Cupid, a spacecraft home to a diverse cast of intriguing and charming characters, each with their own unique stories and personalities.

Meet Doc, an alien medical professional with a secret to hide and a passion for cooking--even though their food isn't always edible. Engage with Ovid, the bashful cultural expert of the crew, often lost in his own thoughts. Get to know Antoni, the charismatic but self-conscious human captain who keeps his emotions under wraps. Befriend Britt Bot, a sassy robot analyst who holds a deep fear of becoming obsolete. Spend time with Siphri, the humorous engineer with a past shrouded in mystery.

In this game of love and interstellar politics, your actions and choices matter. Navigating through your relationships with these characters will not only affect the narrative but may also culminate in romantic adventures in the midst of the cosmic wilderness.

As a representative of Earth in the Galactic Starforce (G.S.F.), you and your crew are tasked with maintaining the allure and charm of the galaxy, battling against the unappealing forces of the PROODs. Your missions will take you to an array of dazzling locales across different planets, each with its own unique charm and peril.

"Galactic Starforce" offers a blend of humorous dialogue, thrilling space adventures, and a taste of romance under the starlit sky. Will you find love or merely fleeting attractions? Can you keep the universe from losing its sexiness? Board the Cupid and set off on your space odyssey to find out!

name: Galactic Starforce

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Join the interstellar journey in "Galactic Starforce", a visual novel where you, the cadet, navigate a colorful crew in their quest to keep the cosmos sexy. Choose your alliances and find love amongst the stars!
